    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Asciiui
     
    AutoBuilder
    This class is used to generate a ship automatically by placing random tiles on the board in the gui.
    AutoBuilder
    This class is used to generate random ships and place them on the board in the tui.
    Building
     
    Callback
     
    CardScene
     
    ClientInterface
     
    ClientMain
     
    Config
    Factory for the ClientInterface.
    Controller
    This class gives an interface between the model and the view.
    End
    Manages the end screen with the points obtained by each player.
    FrameGenerator
     
    Game
    This class is used to manage the game.
    GUIEventListener
     
    GUIMain
    Main class of the GUI.
    IntegerBox
     
    Launcher
     
    Logger
     
    Login
    Controller of the login screen, manages the entire process in the gui.
    Main
     
    PlaceholderCallback
    This class implements the Callback interface and provides just a placeholder.
    RMIClient
     
    RMIInterface
     
    Welcome
